SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.core.model

Class PlayerState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.core.model.Player
it.polimi.ingsw.core.model.PlayerState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlayerState extends Player implements Serializable
This class represents a PlayerState in the game. It extends the Player class and implements Serializable interface. It maintains the score, starterCard, hand, chat, pawn, board, cardWidth, cardHeight, matrixDimension, codex, matrix, secretObj, personalResources, connected, lastPingTime and other related data.
See Also:
